items.name: CDR
items.description: common regular data register for dual mode

fields.name: CKMODE
fields.description: ADC clock mode These bits are set and cleared by software to define the ADC clock scheme (which is common to both master and slave ADCs): In all synchronous clock modes, there is no jitter in the delay from a timer trigger to the start of a conversion. Note: The software is allowed to write these bits only when the ADCs are disabled (ADCAL = 0, JADSTART = 0, ADSTART = 0, ADSTP = 0, ADDIS = 0 and ADEN = 0).

fields.name: PRESC
fields.description: ADC prescaler These bits are set and cleared by software to select the frequency of the clock to the ADC. The clock is common for all the ADCs. other: reserved Note: The software is allowed to write these bits only when the ADC is disabled (ADCAL = 0, JADSTART = 0, ADSTART = 0, ADSTP = 0, ADDIS = 0 and ADEN = 0). The ADC prescaler value is applied only when CKMODE[1:0] = 0b00.

fields.name: VREFEN
fields.description: VREFINT enable This bit is set and cleared by software to enable/disable the VREFINT channel

fields.name: TSEN
fields.description: VSENSE enable This bit is set and cleared by software to control VSENSE

fields.name: VBATEN
fields.description: VBAT enable This bit is set and cleared by software to control

fieldset/CDR.description: common regular data register for dual mode

fields.name: RDATA_MST
fields.description: Regular data of the master ADC. In dual mode, these bits contain the regular data of the master ADC. Refer to . The data alignment is applied as described in offset (ADC_DR, OFFSET, OFFSET_CH, ALIGN)) In MDMA = 0b11 mode, bits 15:8 contains SLV_ADC_DR[7:0], bits 7:0 contains MST_ADC_DR[7:0].

fields.name: RDATA_SLV
fields.description: Regular data of the slave ADC In dual mode, these bits contain the regular data of the slave ADC. Refer to Dual ADC modes. The data alignment is applied as described in offset (ADC_DR, OFFSET, OFFSET_CH, ALIGN)).

fields.name: ADRDY_MST
fields.description: Master ADC ready This bit is a copy of the ADRDY bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOSMP_MST
fields.description: End of Sampling phase flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the EOSMP bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOC_MST
fields.description: End of regular conversion of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the EOC bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOS_MST
fields.description: End of regular sequence flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the EOS bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: OVR_MST
fields.description: Overrun flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the OVR bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JEOC_MST
fields.description: End of injected conversion flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the JEOC bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JEOS_MST
fields.description: End of injected sequence flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the JEOS bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD1_MST
fields.description: Analog watchdog 1 flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD1 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD2_MST
fields.description: Analog watchdog 2 flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD2 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD3_MST
fields.description: Analog watchdog 3 flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD3 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JQOVF_MST
fields.description: Injected Context Queue Overflow flag of the master ADC This bit is a copy of the JQOVF bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: ADRDY_SLV
fields.description: Slave ADC ready This bit is a copy of the ADRDY bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOSMP_SLV
fields.description: End of Sampling phase flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the EOSMP2 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOC_SLV
fields.description: End of regular conversion of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the EOC bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: EOS_SLV
fields.description: End of regular sequence flag of the slave ADC. This bit is a copy of the EOS bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: OVR_SLV
fields.description: Overrun flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the OVR bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JEOC_SLV
fields.description: End of injected conversion flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the JEOC bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JEOS_SLV
fields.description: End of injected sequence flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the JEOS bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD1_SLV
fields.description: Analog watchdog 1 flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD1 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD2_SLV
fields.description: Analog watchdog 2 flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD2 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: AWD3_SLV
fields.description: Analog watchdog 3 flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the AWD3 bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: JQOVF_SLV
fields.description: Injected Context Queue Overflow flag of the slave ADC This bit is a copy of the JQOVF bit in the corresponding ADC_ISR register.

fields.name: ADCNUM
fields.description: Number of ADCs implemented

fields.name: MULPIPE
fields.description: Number of pipeline stages

fields.name: OPBITS
fields.description: Number of option bits 0002: 2 option bits implemented in the ADC option register (ADC_OR) at address offset 0xC8.

fields.name: IDLEVALUE
fields.description: Idle value for non-selected channels

fields.name: ID
fields.description: Peripheral identifier These bits returns the ADC identifier. ID[31:0] = 0x0011 0006: c7amba_aditf5_90_v1.

fields.name: SID
fields.description: Size Identification SID[31:8]: fixed code that characterizes the ADC_SIDR register. This field is always read at 0xA3C5DD. SID[7:0]: read-only numeric field that returns the address offset (in Kbytes) of the identification registers from the IP base address:.

fields.name: MINREV
fields.description: Minor revision These bits returns the ADC IP minor revision 0002: Major revision = X.2.

fields.name: MAJREV
fields.description: Major revision These bits returns the ADC IP major revision
